name: Samurai Saviour
description:
Centennial College Fall Game Jam 2022

The god of the moon, Tsukiyomi, has raised an army to take over the entire nation! Having left you in the woods to die, The god Izanagi grants you his aid to live and fight again! Take up arms in the name of the God of Gods and push the army back, save your people and become the Samurai Saviour!

Controls

Movement - W, A, S, D Keys

Aim - Mouse

Throw Projectile - Left Click

Instant Restart - R Key

Members

Daniel Davy - Audio/Musician

Daniel Wallace - Programmer/Designer

Declan Mccormick - Narrative/SFX

Jacob Giannone - Designer/UI

Kurt Perez - Artist/Animator

Navin Mangar - Programmer/Technical Artist
